section.5: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abu Sa'id al-Khudri reported:The Apostle of Allah (ï·º) saw sputum sticking to the Qibla of the mosque. He scratched it off with a pebble and then forbade spitting on the right side or in front, but (it is permissible) to spit on the left side or under the left foot
